register_page = name = 'zmason', mail = 'gordonjamesaexample.org', pwd = 'yN2dE0' @pytest.mark.parametrize("name, mail, pwd", [email_format_validation[0]]) def test_register_email_error_txt(register_page, name, mail, pwd): """Verify presence of the error message if invalid email format."""
